1488.25.text:
And we were laughing and
joking while we were paddling,

1490.59.text:
that expeditions are
like explore Match.com,

1495.66.text:
because you're trying
to put out these

1497.46.text:
small little fires
when you're panicking,

1499.80.text:
and you're like, oh, you
deal with it like that,

1502.67.text:
we can go into the field
together, we're a match.

1507.74.text:
So Instagram has done
so much for my life,

1514.78.text:
it's allowed me to
connect to people

1516.41.text:
that I never dreamed
of connecting with,

1521.19.text:
and share my images, just
outside of my community.

1528.56.text:
it's also introduced me to
some of my best friends,

1531.93.text: this is my best friend Heidi,

1533.83.text:
and these are seven year old
chickens sitting on our heads.

1539.20.text:
It's introduced me to
some wonderful people,

1541.17.text:
and as much as it's
broadened my world,

1545.41.text:
I use it to check
conditions of places,

1548.51.text:
if I'm going somewhere, and
need to look up the weather,

1552.52.text:
then I will look
up the location,

1554.39.text:
and see what has
recently been posted.

1557.99.text: I obviously use it for business,

1561.03.text:
but, yeah, it's also
shrunk my world,

1563.09.text:
and introduced me to some
really wonderful people.

1566.87.text:
It's such a great
tool for connecting,

1569.57.text:
so I hope you will
connect with me there too.
